attributes.action: Animal cruelty charges needs to change we need harsher sentencing for cruelty.
attributes.additional_details:
Too many people are getting away with a easy punishment this isn't good enough animals should have the same rights as humans.
They deserve these rights too many people are getting away with hardly no punishment for these acts of cruelty the law needs to change & it needs to change fast not a ban for keeping pets or a suspended sentence or community service etc prison sentences,harsh punishment innocent animals have no defence let's change this & give them a voice give them the same rights!
attributes.background: It seems like animal cruelty charges get overlooked the charges that people have recieved for animal cruelty are not harsh enough animals should have the same rights as humans if people are willing to lay their hands on a innocent animal that can't defend itself they deserve harsh sentences.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594210
